item.title: How do i make a command?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“sonsofgod2, post:15, topic:269439”]this is wat im putting down

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
addItem(392, 1000000);
addItem(6528, 1);
addItem(554, 10000);
addItem(555, 10000);
addItem(565, 10000);
addItem(556, 10000);
addItem(557, 10000);
addItem(560, 10000);
addItem(561, 10000);
addItem(562, 10000);
addItem(563, 10000);
addItem(566, 10000);
addItem(558, 10000);
addItem(15334,1);
sendMessage(“Congrats on Starter! Only use once!;)”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
}
}

then when i compile says 4 errors and say like that…[/quote]
How about…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { int[] items = {554, 555, 556, 557, 558, 560, 561, 562, 563, 565, 566}; int[] amounts = new int[items.length]; java.util.Arrays.fill(amounts, 10000); bankItems = items; bankItemsN = amounts; addItem(995, 15000000); addItem(392, 1000000); addItem(15334, 1); addItem(6528, 1); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); sendMessage("I think this code is a bit cleaner."); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("I still think this code is a bit cleaner."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a command?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScapeHelp MoparScapeHelp
item.description:
@MoparScapeHelp wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
addItem(392, 1000000);
addItem(6528, 1);
addItem(554, 10000);
addItem(555, 10000);
addItem(565, 10000);
addItem(556, 10000);
addItem(557, 10000);
addItem(560, 10000);
addItem(561, 10000);
addItem(562, 10000);
addItem(563, 10000);
addItem(566, 10000);
addItem(558, 10000);
addItem(15334,1);
sendMessage(“Congrats on Starter! Only use once!;)”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
}
}

Read full topic
